abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Public Sector
            Capacity Building Program Support Project is to improve the
            scale, efficiency, and responsiveness of public service
            delivery at the federal, regional and local level; to
            empower citizens to participate more effectively in shaping
            their own development and to promote good governance and
            accountability. The reallocation is necessary to meet actual
            projects needs during implementation and do not involve any
            new changes to the original project description, objectives
            or associated outcomes as well as use of cost of project
            savings. In summary, the team considers the reallocation to
            be a minor one because there is no change in the project
            description, development objectives, and targets. In
            addition the main beneficiaries of the
            nationally-administered systems are principally the regions.
            The total amount that government seeks to reallocate is
            equivalent to US$10 million.
